title: Walking in Paris - speaker and Nana have achieved

content.question: The speaker’s claim in lines 50-51 (“our lives once more perfected / and unused”) suggests that the speaker and Nana have achieved

choices.label: an escape from their later selves

content.answer: an escape from their later selves

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
